about-text:
My name is Maria, and I am a full-stack developer with more than 2 years of experience in creating modern and functional web-applications. 
My goal is to create solutions that are user-friendly and effectively solve business problems.
I am proud to work with each client individually, taking into account all the needs and wishes.
If you need a high-quality web-solution that will work for you and your audience, I will be happy to help you bring your ideas to life.
works-text: I specialize in website development, from simple landing pages to complex platforms with integrations and user interfaces.
links__heading: Leave your contacts and I will get back to you
links__contact-head: Leave your contact (email, telegram or phone)
links__success: Your message has been sent successfully!
links__fail: Mistake! Try again or contact me in a way that is convenient for you.
